column1:
Patch22,"2014-06-10T18:18:53.307Z","70208: Chi Panthar Review ","

I was looking forward to these new Chima Ultra Build Figures being released and I'
column2: m really happy I finally have one.

column1: This is my first one of the new Fire vs Ice wave of Ultra Build Figures, so there are lots of new pieces.
The packaging for this set is just like most other Ultra Build sets, it comes in a bag that is re-sealable.
The Instructions are fine, though like some other Ultra Build sets they are a bit crushed.
The new parts in this set are great for MOCs, even though this set doesn'
column2: t have as many Transparent bone pieces.

column1: The new pieces in this set include two of the new sliver weapon piece, six of the new gold claw piece,a brand new armour piece and Panthar'
The build is pretty average for an Ultra Build set and takes very little time to assemble it.
The complete model looks really cool and the new armour piece with the Chi Orb looks really good and the Chi function works really well.

column2: is also really good for posing and his opening mouth is great.

column1: This set is worth the money for sure and if you are a fan of Hero Factory,Bionicle or Chima this is a set worth getting.
